refnamediv.refpurpose:
Convert a long
character code to a character or wide character

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
chr
returns a new one character long string containing the character with character code given as parameter.

refsect2.para:
The LONG
character code value for the character
or wide character
to be produced.

refsect1.title: Return Values
refsect1.para:
If the chr_code
is smaller than or equal to 255, the returned 1 character string will be of type VARCHAR
. Otherwise the returned type is NVARCHAR
.

example.title: Stored procedure example
example.para: This stored procedure lists the ASCII values and characters in a string given as argument.
